LanguageData.Plant_Grass.label: 雑草
LanguageData.Plant_Grass.description: 雑草は、わずかな明かりと栄養があれば、どこにでも繁茂します。
LanguageData.Plant_TallGrass.label: イネ科の草
LanguageData.Plant_TallGrass.description: 背丈が高い植物です。この草が生い茂った中は歩きにくいです。
LanguageData.Plant_Bush.label: 低木
LanguageData.Plant_Brambles.label: イバラ
LanguageData.Plant_Brambles.description: Tangled, thorny, woody shoots covered with leaves. Brambles grow in clusters, and slow down anyone moving over them.
LanguageData.Plant_HealrootWild.label: 野ヒールルート
LanguageData.Plant_HealrootWild.description: A slow-growing plant which yields herbal medicine when harvested.\n\nThis wild breed of healroot is hardier than domesticated healroot, but too difficult to cultivate. It is prized by tribespeople in colder climates.
